item.title: Weapon makes me invisible
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

remove all your armor off and have nothing on besides the weapon
if it shows without all the other stuff on it means it has high poly

item.title: Weapon makes me invisible
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

The model number or the id number is too high possibly? The model is badly animated? The model is badly made and the client fails to load it? This should be in client help.

item.title: Weapon makes me invisible
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

everytime i weild my weapon it makes me invisible.

Its my own custom weapon.

My ints:

if(i == 13103) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14132; class8.anInt165 = 14131; class8.anInt200 = 14131; class8.anInt181 = 2500; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 1300; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Shadow Blade"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Very Rare Blade!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }

i have added it to my item.cfg, ive done add model ### and all that bs. Why is this happening? my drop/inv model is fine.

Read full topic
